name: update_from_json
short: Apply guild structure updates from a JSON snapshot
description: Parses an uploaded JSON snapshot, previews changes, waits for ✅/❌ from the invoker, and applies role/category/channel updates with overwrites.
author: MiHSEF
install_msg: Loaded. Use `[p]mihsef update_from_json` with a snapshot JSON attached.
end_user_data_statement: This cog reads an uploaded JSON of server structure. It does not store personal data.
